Title: Following Chairman Mao's instructions, we must undertake a course of education in the whole party in the fields of thought and political line
Designer: Propaganda Office of the Political Work Group of the Guangzhou Municipal Revolutionary Committee (广州市革命委员会政工组宣传办公司)
Publisher: Guangdong renmin chubanshe (广东人民出版社)
Notes: The tower with the red torch on top, left in the background, is the "Huanghuagang Mausoleum" for 72 revolutionaries who died in Second Guangzhou Uprising, April 1911.
